segments.text: What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you need to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to take the driver's course . How many hours do I need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It depends on what you're trying to do with the completion of the course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to get my license .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're going to need to complete six hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many hours a day can I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can do two hours a day for three days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all I need to do to finish ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's all you need to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'll get back to you .
segments.speaker: S2
